from django.db import models
from django.contrib.auth.models import User




[docs]
class EmergencyService(models.Model):
    """
    Represents available emergency services with their details.

    Attributes:
    - SERVICE_CHOICES (list): List of available emergency services.
    - service_type (CharField): The type of service (Ambulance or Paramedics).
    - cost (IntegerField): Cost associated with the service.
    - ETA (CharField): Estimated Time of Arrival for the service.
    """

    SERVICE_CHOICES = [
        ('Ambulance', 'Ambulance'),
        ('Paramedics', 'Paramedics'),
    ]

    service_type = models.CharField(max_length=20, choices=SERVICE_CHOICES)
    cost = models.IntegerField()
    ETA = models.CharField(max_length=20)  # Estimated Time of Arrival

    def __str__(self):
        """Return a string representation of the EmergencyService instance."""
        return self.service_type






[docs]
class EmergencyServiceRequest(models.Model):
    """
    Represents a patient's request to utilize an emergency service.

    Attributes:
    - PENDING (str): Constant for 'Pending' status.
    - APPROVED (str): Constant for 'Approved' status.
    - REJECTED (str): Constant for 'Rejected' status.
    - STATUS_CHOICES (list): List of available status choices.
    - patient (ForeignKey): Reference to the User who made the request.
    - service (ForeignKey): Reference to the requested emergency service.
    - request_date (DateTimeField): Date and time when the request was made.
    - status (CharField): The status of the request.
    """

    PENDING = 'Pending'
    APPROVED = 'Approved'
    REJECTED = 'Rejected'
    STATUS_CHOICES = [
        (PENDING, 'Pending'),
        (APPROVED, 'Approved'),
        (REJECTED, 'Rejected'),
    ]

    patient = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    service = models.ForeignKey(EmergencyService, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    request_date = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
    status = models.CharField(max_length=10, choices=STATUS_CHOICES, default=PENDING)

    def __str__(self):
        """Return a string representation of the EmergencyServiceRequest instance."""
        return f"{self.patient}'s request for {self.service}"
